article_title: DC execs equally worried about litigation, participant goals
article_text:
Executives for defined contribution plans have not one main fear, but two.

While they’re concerned about meeting participant retirement goals, they’re just as concerned about the potential for litigation.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Marlene Y. Satter
article_metadata.description: Executives for defined contribution plans have two main fears, not one, according to a PIMCO trends survey.
